scripts.setup: npm run global.installs && npm run setup.mobile && npm run setup.wear && npm run setup.ns.bluetooth && npm run setup.ns.animated-circle
scripts.setup.all: npm i && npm run global.installs && npm run setup.all.non-global
scripts.setup.all.non-global: npm i && npm run setup.mobile && npm run setup.wear && npm run setup.@permobil && npm run setup.ns.bluetooth && npm run setup.ns.animated.circle
scripts.setup.mobile: cd apps/mobile/pushtracker && npm i && cd ../smart-eval && npm i
scripts.setup.wear: cd apps/wear/pushtracker && npm i && cd ../smartdrive && npm i
scripts.setup.@permobil: npm run setup.@permobil/angular && npm run setup.@permobil/core && npm run setup.@permobil/nativescript
scripts.global.installs: npm i -g rimraf && npm i -g typescript
scripts.clean.all: npm run clean && npm run clean.@permobil && npm run clean.pt.mobile && npm run clean.se.mobile && npm run clean.pt.wear && npm run clean.sd.wear && npm run clean.forked.plugins
scripts.clean.pt.mobile: cd apps/mobile/pushtracker && rimraf platforms hooks node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.clean.se.mobile: cd apps/mobile/smart-eval && rimraf platforms hooks node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.clean.pt.wear: cd apps/wear/pushtracker && rimraf platforms hooks node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.clean.sd.wear: cd apps/wear/smartdrive && rimraf platforms hooks node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.clean.@permobil: npm run clean.@permobil.angular && npm run clean.@permobil.nativescript
scripts.clean.forked.plugins: npm run clean.ns.bluetooth && npm run clean.ns.animated.circle
scripts.nuki: npm run clean.all && npm run setup.all
scripts.pt.m.clean: cd apps/mobile/pushtracker && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.pt.m.ios.release: npm run nuki && cd apps/mobile/pushtracker && tns build ios --release --bundle --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.pt.m.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.pushtracker > layout-profile.txt
scripts.pt.m.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.pushtracker framestats > framestats.txt
scripts.se.clean: cd apps/mobile/smart-eval && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && npm i

scripts.se.start.android: cd apps/mobile/smart-eval && tsc && tns run android --env.aot
scripts.se.start.android.report: cd apps/mobile/smart-eval && tsc && tns run android --env.aot --env.report
scripts.se.i: cd apps/mobile/smart-eval && tsc && tns run ios --env.aot
